channel.title: How to PortForward
channel.description:
Ok, now I know this is probably really simple, but I'm just not getting it. I've visited the Portforward Website plenty of times, and I've downloaded their port checker tool and their static Ip setter. This might be the key to getting my server online, I don't know. Could someone please explain to me how to do this correctly?
Thanks.

item.title: How to PortForward
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

you’re right. I was just really hoping someone could make it easier for me. but thanks anyways.

Read full topic
